item.title: Product Flaws That We Encounter Regularly
item.description: A lot of us must have gotten irritated by such small, but so very obvious product/UX fails that we just can’t comprehend how can they be. Here is a summary of a few of those I have encountered, or know about. Enjoy 1. Logout confirmation on a different page You click logout The website shows/not-shows confirmation dialog You click yes The website takes you to another page telling you “It’s okay to not logout.
